abstract: Sanya Richards-Ross anchors United States women's team to victory in 1,600-meter relay--her final race at Penn Relays in Philadelphia; other track and field news noted.

headline.main: Sanya Richards-Ross Goes Out With a Victory

snippet: Richards-Ross, a three-time Olympian and a three-time gold medalist, called her final race at the Penn Relays in Philadelphia her victory lap.
lead_paragraph: Richards-Ross, a three-time Olympian and a three-time gold medalist, called her final race at the Penn Relays in Philadelphia her victory lap.
